name: The Darkness Calls
description:
"The Darkness Calls" is a short horror-esque visual novel made for the "Try something new" Game Jam. 

Grief is hard to overcome, but especially so for you. Ever since HE died, you haven't been the same...

Made within a week for the "Try Something New" Game Jam

3 Bad Ends

2 Good Ends

1 True End

MUSIC USED---
